alert.note: Alert for Larimer; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:19PM MDT until August 01 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Larimer County in north central Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 419 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Natural Fort, or 21 miles southwest of Cheyenne, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Carr and Natural Fort. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
